title: Client constantly trying to reconnect?
body: Client keeps stopping and trying to reconnect, Have had 3 dodges in a row between my 5 man because of this.

replies.body: It has to be frustrating stacking dodges up like that, and I'd like to help.  If you're getting the reconnect error after champion select then your network might be having issues like a block or instability.  You'll want to go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot.  Make sure to test it in a custom game to prevent more penalties.  Let me know if you have any questions.

Thank you, The client is fine now, but I wasn't the only one. I was in a 5 man queue and all of us were disconnecting at the exact same time. It seemed like the client was having issues. Luckily the dodge went to one person each so it didnt stack on us.
